task.title: Starting the Car
task.shortdesc: Initiate vehicle movement by carefully managing throttle, clutch, and gear lever operations.

prereq.p: Ensure you are seated in the driver's position with clear surroundings.

step.cmd: Slightly accelerate the engine by opening the throttle.
Press the clutch pedal halfway forward to hold it in neutral position.
Press the pedal forward into slow speed.
Allow the car to gain sufficient headway (20 to 30 feet).
Slowly drop the pedal back into high speed.

stepxmp.p: Simultaneously, partially close the throttle to help the engine pick up its load smoothly.

result.p: The car is now in motion and transitioning to high speed.

postreq.p: With practice, this speed change process will become smooth and nearly imperceptible.
